content: and enjoy abbreviations st s stitch es p purl sl slip_stitch purlwise onto left needle k2tog knit 2 sts together k knit p2tog purl two sts together m1l make one left with left needle pick up the bar between the two sts from the front knit into it through the back of the stitch bc back cross slip 1 st to cable needle and hold in back k2 then p1 from cable needle fc front cross slip 2 sts to cable needle and hold in front p1 then k2 from cable needle
